title: fry
description: Hoisin sauce gives a lovely salty-sweet flavour to a stir-fry you can whip up in minutes. Each serving provides 103kcal, 3g protein, 7g carbohydrate (of which 7g sugars), 6g fat (of which 0.7g saturates), 3.5g fibre and 1.4g salt.
ingredients: 1 cm piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
½ carrot, peeled and cut into matchsticks
½ red pepper, cut into thick matchsticks
½ courgette, cut into thick matchsticks
75g sugar snap peas or mange tout, trimmed
